title: IT Stocks to buy: HCL Tech, Infosys and Tech Mahindra among top JM Financial picks, shares may rally up to 25% - The Financial Express
content: IT Stocks to buy: HCL Tech, Infosys and Tech Mahindra among top JM Financial picks, shares may rally up to 25%  The Financial Express
description: HCL Technology, Infosys and Tech Mahindra remain the JM Financial's top IT stock picks amongst Tier I techs, while PSYS and MPHL are top picks amongst Tier II companies as these stocks may rally up to 25%.
